desc: Looking for someone who is experienced & comfortable in developing mobile applications using React Native Framework or Nativescript. The application should be working and optimized for both Android and IOS.Both FRONTEND (the app) along with a web based BACKEND will be needed.  Use of best practices are required, and native use of transitions, reloading, animations are necessary as well.App Specifications:-	User Access: Ability to sign-up using Facebook and Google. With email verification requirement. BACKEND: Ability to manage users.-	Maps: You'll likely be using Mapview component by AirBNB. Need to display nearby locations set within the database with a price range ($, $$, $$$, etc.) Ability to filter the map search via price point, type of location, etc. Obviously, as you pan around the map, it should update with the locations within that view. BACKEND: Ability to add/edit/delete locations, and their information.-	QR/Barcode: Utilize the camera to scan QR/Barcode (camera viewfinder should show an outline of the QR/barcode alignment) of the product. Each QR code will be unique, and it will be applied as loyalty points to the user's account. The loyalty point can either go to 1 user, or can be split between multiple users (their group). Need to consider low-light shots properly utilizing the flash when necessary. BACKEND: Ability to add/edit/delete the QR/Barcode with a point value set. Ability to add loyalty point promotion: For example, 2x points from xxx date to xxx date.-	Point Redemption: User will be able to view their current point balance, with a section where they can view the available rewards they can redeem. They can redeem the points they have to claim their reward as long as it’s within the point balance. Once they decide to redeem a reward, they’ll be taken to the order processing page to submit their shipping address, confirm reward and points used. User should be able to check the status of the redemption at any time within their accounts page. Rewards section will have all rewards available, with the ability to sort by low -> high, high -> low, redeemable (within point balance). BACKEND: Ability to add/edit/delete rewards, set point requirement, image, description, availability date range, etc.-	Account/Member Page: Will show their accumulated points, their personal info, shipping address, previous reward redemption + status, ability to edit login password, etc. BACKEND: Ability to manage users and adjust points.-	Home/Main Page: Will show the different news/promotions as full screen banners. (i.e. 2X Point Promotion until xxxx date) The slides should be swipe-friendly, and auto slide if no interaction is made. BACKEND: Managing each of the banners. Ability to add background image, text, graphical assets, buttons with links to different parts of the app, and etc.The app's main functions are to maintain brand loyalty by scanning QR codes to earn points, which in turn can be used to redeem various rewards.Although we will be providing the mock-up designs, the applicant should have the experience and eye for design in order to replicate and improve upon the mock-up images.Interested applicants must share previous related work, as well as references from previous clients.Applicant must agree to dedicate resources on fixing issues, and squashing bugs.Payment will ONLY be provided AFTER successful completion of project. Consistent updates on progress of the application is required by the applicant.Please feel free to contact me for further questions.
title: React Native or Native-script IOS/Android Application

desc: I am looking for a matrimonial / matchmaking mobile app solution native to android and iOS. Will need something that shares the functionality of the [url removed, login to view] mobile app. Below are some of the core requirements that I will need in the app.1) Facebook integration to register/login on the app.2) Sms verification from a real carrier (voip, google and virtual numbers should be declined).3) Based on the sms country that will be the default country select for the user and can not be updated.2) Instant Live one on one chat for app users who have matched (built in chat messenger). And a traditional inbox for offline messaging. But both should be connected. If the user goes offline the chat message should be send to the inbox.3) All submitted profiles have to be approved by staff members but if needed can turn on and off this feature4) Will need a good set of basic and advance search pages (or one search page that can be extended to an advance search)5) Good privacy setting. Ability to hide pictures and contact information from non connected. The rest profile information has to remain public.6) Help and support section with tutorials and pictures.7) Backend Admin control to control any user app activity. And ability to change and update options and make small changes to the app. Also ability to control, modify, approve, create and delete user accounts.8) Will need a modern look also a random match making option (Swipe left or right) like tinder or minder for users residing in the same country.9) The app should keep a history of all the invitation to connect sent by a user and categorize them into accepted, pending and declines. And have this section available to the end user.10) Also ability to some how block certain imei, cell phone numbers and ip address for users who get reported.11) Will need the flexibility of setting how many invitations can be sent in a 24 hour period. And how many times/profiles you can view the contact information for on weekly bases. This number has to customizable in the admin pane.12) The instant chat and number of request to connect (invitation) should have the flexibility to be moved down to a priced pan later down the road. Also for a paid plan/subscription user profile will be displayed as feature for a specific amount of days/months.13) The app has to be very robust, dynamic, responsive and fast. Have to work on all Android and iOS devices. Please don't hardcode any functionality. As if in the future I should request an update or support. Will be much easier for you to apply that update. And the same code can be used for the 2nd project as well.14) The developer will deploy these apps for us on our servers and provide support for the initial production stage. Also will need a feedback on which technologies to use for this services. And submitting these to google play store and apple app store.-----------**Currently we have a free site up and running on wordpress [url removed, login to view] . This will be taken down once the mobile app is deployed. But the [url removed, login to view] domain will be used for building the mobile app.**If everything goes well. I have a very similar second project waiting. And might sign up for monthly support with the developer.
title: Matrimonial Mobile App

desc: I need  an iPhone app.  I would like it designed and built.  I am currently working within a group project in the creation of a new app called “Waist not want not” this would essentially allow individuals to scan their food products from shopping and enter their bar code, it would then alert them when products are near the expiration date aswell as suggest meal ideas with the current food they have in their homes. We are looking to make the app available free one the App Store yet make money from advertisements on the app. The main target market is university students who often struggle to know what to eat/how to make a certain meal, and often waste a lot of food due to not consuming it during the advised time on the packaging.
title: Mobile development

desc: I need someone who can take on the whole project, develop the website, iOS and Android app, create a name and logo and see the whole project to the end.What I'm looking for is the next Twitter.  I want to be able to do minimal administration to maintain it.  I would like it to be user friendly, able to post links and videos easily.  The ability to review a complaint about a user quick and easily, their history, their IP, etc.  I would like to be able to restrict not only an IP, but a country if needed.This social media has to be as troll free as possible, giving the true meaning to Free Speech.  I'm looking to monetize it, to pay for the expenses, and create an income.  So, I would like to use AdMob, and other ad revenue sources as part of the app/site.
title: Develop The Next Twitter
